medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced a rapid decline in exercise capacity over the past 2 months, becoming unable to climb a flight of stairs without stopping to catch her breath. She had completed a half-marathon 2 months prior and underwent a course of azithromycin without benefit.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Stage II left breast adenocarcinoma successfully treated 2 years prior with Adriamycin-containing chemotherapy, radiation to the left chest, and bilateral mastectomy. No previous heart disease or cardiovascular risk factors, except for a distant 10-pack-year smoking history.
medical_history.social_history: No history of illicit substance abuse.
